headline: Boost the audio experience with purpose-built JL Audio AP Amplifiers from Garmin
summary: Garmin (NYSE: GRMN), the world's largest marine electronics manufacturer1, today announced the JL Audio® AP Amplifiers, an all-new series that delivers powerful audio to every part of the boat or off-road vehicle with an ultracompact design. Boaters and adventure-seekers can choose from four different options, including a model with Bluetooth® technology that seamlessly connects with a compatible smartphone to stream audio on the go.

headline: Increase awareness around the truck with the innovative dēzl DualView camera system from Garmin
summary: Garmin (NYSE: GRMN) today announced the innovative dēzl™ DualView, a rugged two-camera system that keeps over-the-road drivers aware of their surroundings by providing a clear, live view down each side of their truck. Once installed, video from the camera system is viewable in-cab on a paired tablet, dēzl OTR navigator or compatible RV navigator, allowing users to monitor blind spots and receive alerts for merging traffic. headline: Stay on top of nutrition goals in Garmin Connect
summary: Garmin (NYSE: GRMN) is making it easier for users to track their food intake with the addition of nutrition tracking in Garmin Connect™. This feature is the latest of several exciting enhancements for those with a Garmin Connect+ plan, letting users track their calories and macros (proteins, fats and carbs) and receive Active Intelligence insights to help them achieve their nutrition goals.
